entities.description: ocr  optical character recognition  is a technology used to convert documents into plain text
rag  retrieval augmented generation  is a method used for document level qa  with graph based approaches being state of the art
graph based rag is a state of the art approach that uses graph data as an external knowledge source for document qa
figure 1 is an illustration that shows the two paradigms of existing rag approaches for document level qa

relations.description: ocr is used as a preliminary step in one paradigm of rag approaches to convert documents into plain text
graph based rag is described as a state of the art approach within text based rag methods
figure 1 illustrates the existing rag approaches for document level qa
